meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was truly stupendous.
meanings.sent2: The view from the mountaintop was absolutely stupendous.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick was so stupendous that everyone gasped in amazement.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for painting was as stupendous as a masterpiece in a museum.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the discovery was so stupendous that it changed the course of history.

meanings.definition: Of a size or scale that is astonishing or awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent1: The stupendous size of the whale left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: The stupendous scale of the waterfall was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so stupendous that it could feed the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The task ahead seemed as stupendous as climbing a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the explosion was so stupendous that it shook the entire city.
